description:
effective_go.html: add a section on type assertions
The information was missing, oddly enough.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM https://codereview.appspot.com/7636044/diff/1/doc/effective_go.html File doc/effective_go.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7636044/diff/1/doc/effective_go.html#newcode2134 doc/effective_go.html:2134: interfaceValue.(typeName) You switched from value above to interfaceValue here. Maybe keep using value. https://codereview.appspot.com/7636044/diff/1/doc/effective_go.html#newcode2150 doc/effective_go.html:2150: To guard against that, use the "comma, ok" idiom to test, safely, whether the value is a string: s/ / / after idiom https://codereview.appspot.com/7636044/diff/1/doc/effective_go.html#newcode2168 doc/effective_go.html:2168: As an illusration of the capability, here's an if-else illusTration

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=93d59641a1b1 ***

effective_go.html: add a section on type assertions
The information was missing, oddly enough.

R=golang-dev, rsc, iant

subject: code review 7636044: effective_go.html: add a section on type assertions
